price: 94. Ha ka dhigannina dhaarahiinna siyaalo aad isku khiyaantaan dhexdiinna, si aanay cagi u sidban kaddib sugnaashaheeda, oo aad dhadhamisaan xumaan (cadaab) inaad ka jeedsateen Jidka Alle darteed,  waxaadna mudan Cadaab daran.
arabic: وَلَا تَتَّخِذُوٓاْ أَيۡمَٰنَكُمۡ دَخَلَۢا بَيۡنَكُمۡ فَتَزِلَّ قَدَمُۢ بَعۡدَ ثُبُوتِهَا وَتَذُوقُواْ ٱلسُّوٓءَ بِمَا صَدَدتُّمۡ عَن سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ وَلَكُمۡ عَذَابٌ عَظِيمٞ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walā tattakhidhū aymānakum dakhalan baynakum fatazilla qadamun baʿda thubūtihā watadhūqū al-sūa bimā ṣadadttum ʿan sabīli al-lahi walakum ʿadhābun ʿaẓīmun
